tr.td: Sets the file format of the output files. The file format controls what end of line character is used. Either one of "UNIX", "DOS", MAC", "DEFAULT" or "AUTO" can be used. Defaults to "AUTO" (case insensitive). Defaults to "unix".

Sets the preferences file to use - given either relative to the project's basedir or as an absolute local path or internet address. If omitted, the current preferences are used, if available. Otherwise the Jalopy build-in defaults will be used. Defaults to "${plugin.dir}/jalopy_maven.xml".
Specifies the history policy to use. Either one of "COMMENT", "FILE" or "NONE" can be used. Defaults to "none".
Specifies the logging level for message output. Either one of "ERROR", "WARN", "INFO" or "DEBUG" can be used. Defaults to "info".
Specifies the number of processing threads to use. Integer between 1 - 8. Defaults to "2".
Indicates whether a run should be held if errors occured. Defaults to "true".
Specifies a fileset source file to format. Defaults to "**/*.java".
